message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'd be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $150. It's worth a lot more to me, but I'm willing to make you a great deal. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $100 is my absolute minimum, I'm willing to come up slightly to $125. That's a fair compromise, and it gives us both a good deal. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
